description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1l9es","text":"This protocol details background fluorescence quenching and immunofluorescence staining of human brain tissue for oligomer imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mpj3","text":"Use only clean bottles, flasks, magnetic stirrers, tweezers, weighing spatulas, measuring cylinders – everything should be cleaned, dried and covered if left on the side before next use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6t1u0","text":"Everything should be handled with clean tweezers – gloves should not touch the samples, solutions and ideally anything placed into the solutions where the slides are.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11pe7","text":"Before staining commences keep slides for a few hours but ideally   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fh2jc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"292E0CC0956611ED954AF9D778B2A66C","id":"82420","label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DA054710965C11ED87DF2D70251ED07A","id":"51268","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0b3j","text":"Put slides into methanol + hydrogen peroxide (H202) solution (100 ml: 1 ml) for   at   fresh pot each time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":47,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":49,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":87,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b7b7q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fuekt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"436AE2E0956411ED954AF9D778B2A66C","id":"82426","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"45FE8610956411ED954AF9D778B2A66C","id":"51269","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cj0ge","text":"This process will block any staining of endogenous peroxidase in the tissue sections.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18l76","text":"Perform necessary antigen retrieval pretreatments by pressure cooking in citrate buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56kv8","text":"Pressure cook sections in citrate buffer   for   at pressure (wait for it to release high pressure air) in cleaned pressure cooker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"f16g9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"105FBEF0956111ED954AF9D778B2A66C","id":0,"number":"6"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"1AF343F0956111ED954AF9D778B2A66C","id":"82427","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"606nv","text":"Cool under running Milli Q water – never under tap water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":35,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6d8uk","text":"Block non-specific antigen/antibody binding by placing sections in PBS and Goat Serum 10% (taken from the DNA PAINT protocol) for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":67,"length":22},{"style":"bold","offset":91,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"529D9280956411ED954AF9D778B2A66C","id":"82428","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
